name: Crocalor
flavorText: The combination of Crocalor’s fire energy and overflowing vitality has caused an egg-shaped fireball to appear on the Pokémon’s head.

previous.name: Fuecoco
previous.flavorText: It lies on warm rocks and uses the heat absorbed by its square-shaped scales to create fire energy.

next.name: Skeledirge
next.flavorText: The fiery bird changes shape when Skeledirge sings. Rumor has it that the bird was born when the fireball on Skeledirge’s head gained a soul.
